en: Then Jonah prayed unto Jehovah his God out of the fish’s belly.
hmr: Chun, Jona chu nga phîng sûnga inthawk chun LALPA a Pathien kuoma chun a ṭawngṭai a.

en: And he said, I called by reason of mine affliction unto Jehovah, And he answered me; Out of the belly of Sheol cried I, And thou heardest my voice.
hmr: Hieng ang hin a tih a: “Ka rinumna leiin LALPA chu ka ko a, Ama chun a mi lo dawn a; Seol phîng sûnga inthawk chun ka ko a, Nangin ka râwl chu i hriet a.

en: For thou didst cast me into the depth, in the heart of the seas, And the flood was round about me; All thy waves and thy billows passed over me.
hmr: Inthûktakah tuisuoriet sûngrila chun nang chun i mi peilût a, Tui tamtak chu ka vêlin a um a; I tuifâwnhai le i tui insawkhai po po chun a mi vur pei a.

en: And I said, I am cast out from before thine eyes; Yet I will look again toward thy holy temple.
hmr: Chun, ‘I mithmua inthawka pei suok ka na, Nisienlakhawm, i biekin inthieng tieng ngha nâwk ka tih,’ ka ta.

en: The waters compassed me about, even to the soul; The deep was round about me; The weeds were wrapped about my head.
hmr: Tuihai chun ka hringna chenin an mîn huol vêl a, Tui inthûk chu ka vêlin a um a; Hlohnahai chun ka lu a tuom vêl a nih.

en: I went down to the bottoms of the mountains; The earth with its bars closed upon me for ever: Yet hast thou brought up my life from the pit, O Jehovah my God.
hmr: Tlâng bul tâwp rêthaia chun ka zu feh a, Hnuoi chun kumkhaw ta dingin a kalnahai chun a mi khâr khum a; Amiruokchu, nangin aw LALPA ka Pathien, khursûnga inthawk chun ka hringna chu i lâk suok a nih.

en: When my soul fainted within me, I remembered Jehovah; And my prayer came in unto thee, into thy holy temple.
hmr: Ka hringna chu ka sûnga a chau lai chun, LALPA chu ka hriet zing a; Ka ṭawngṭaina chu i biekin inthienga chun i kuomah a hung tlung a nih.

en: They that regard lying vanities Forsake their own mercy.
hmr: Thil teplo khêl thu mei mei ngaituotuhai chun, An ta dinga ngilneina chu an nghatsan a nih.

en: But I will sacrifice unto thee with the voice of thanksgiving; I will pay that which I have vowed. Salvation is of Jehovah.
hmr: Kei ruok chun lâwmthu hrilna râwl leh i kuomah inthâwina inhlân ka ta; Thu ka tiem ta chu hlen ka ta, Sandamna chu LALPA ta a nih,” tiin.

en: And Jehovah spake unto the fish, and it vomited out Jonah upon the dry land.
hmr: Chun, LALPA chun nga chu a biek a, Jona chu khawmuolah a luok suok tah a.
